title: Harpoon II Deluxe
description: Harpoon II Deluxe Multimedia puts you in command of the awesome power of thw world's moden naval and air force. This is more than just a game. It is an experience that will provide you with hundreds of hours of challenging entertainment. See Key Features for more information. 1 MB hard drive space required, 8 MB RAM, Sound Blaster or 100% compatible, Microsoft or Logitech Mouse, Windows 3.1 or higher, 2 X CD-ROM Drive
